code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Form=_ref=>{let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',email:'',valid:false});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value,valid:prev.name.length>5&&/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(prev.email)}));};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSubmit(formData);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Full Name",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",name:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]});};export default Form;
